com.g3d.util
Class TempVars

java.lang.Object
  com.g3d.util.TempVars

public class TempVars
extends java.lang.Object

Temporary variables assigned to each thread. Engine classes may access these temp variables with TempVars.get(). A method using temp vars with this class is not allowed to make calls to other methods using the class otherwise memory corruption will occur. A locking mechanism may be implemented in the future to prevent the occurance of such situation.
